member.name: CERT_OR_CRL_BLOB
member.summary: The CERT_OR_CRL_BLOB structure encapsulates certificates for use with Internet Key Exchange messages.

summary.para: A DWORD value that specifies the content type of the buffer pointed to by the pbEncoded member.

listheader.description: The pbEncoded member points to an encoded certificate.
The pbEncoded member points to a certificate list.

member.name: CERT_OR_CRL_BLOB.cbEncoded
member.summary: The size, in bytes, of the buffer pointed to by the pbEncoded member.

member.name: CERT_OR_CRL_BLOB.pbEncoded
member.summary: A pointer to a buffer that contains a certificate or a structure that contains an array of certificates as specified by the dwChoice member.
